summary: Successfully tested HR venue name hiding functionality and Indigo layout. Admin login with PIN 1234 works correctly, venue name is properly hidden in HR section header, and complete Indigo HR layout renders with all modules and styling.
passed_tests: Venue name correctly hidden in HR section header (/admin/hr routes)
HR page title 'Human Resources' displays correctly
Indigo modules panel renders with all 8 modules (Dashboards, HR, Payroll & Leave, etc.)
HR operations grid displays with 10 operation tiles (People, Contracts, Shifts, etc.)
Indigo styling applied correctly (96 elements with indigo classes)
No error messages found on HR page
Header shows only user name 'Marvin Gauci' without venue information
